mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNTMPLATINFO (TMPLAT_ID, TMPLAT_NM, TMPLAT_SE_CODE, TMPLAT_COURS, USE_AT, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #{tmplatId}, #{tmplatNm}, #{tmplatSeCode}, #{tmplatCours}, #{useAt}, #{frstRegisterId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(a.TMPLAT_ID) FROM LETTNTMPLATINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM005'
AND a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #{tmplatSeCode}
AND a.TMPLAT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND c.CODE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'

SELECT a.TMPLAT_ID, a.TMPLAT_NM, a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE, a.TMPLAT_COURS, a.USE_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, to_char(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, b.USER_NM AS FRST_REGISTER_NM, c.CODE_NM AS TMPLAT_SE_CODE_NM, a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, d.USER_NM AS LAST_UPDUSR_NM, to_char(a.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM LETTNTMPLATINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = c.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO d ON a.LAST_UPDUSR_ID = d.EMPLYR_ID WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM005' AND a.TMPLAT_ID = #{tmplatId}
mapper.update: UPDATE LETTNTMPLATINFO SET TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #{tmplatSeCode}, TMPLAT_COURS = #{tmplatCours}, USE_AT = #{useAt}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TMPLAT_ID = #{tmplatId}
UPDATE LETTNBBSMASTER SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE TMPLAT_ID = #{tmplatId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.TMPLAT_ID, a.TMPLAT_NM, a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE, a.TMPLAT_COURS, a.USE_AT, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, to_char(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, b.USER_NM AS FRST_REGISTER_NM, c.CODE_NM AS TMPLAT_SE_CODE_NM FROM LETTNTMPLATINFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = c.CODE WHERE c.CODE_ID = 'COM005' AND a.TMPLAT_SE_CODE = #{tmplatSeCode} ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
